globals.members: #Karan Bhandari#Jarrod Dickerson#Said Farivar#Vipul Chopra#Varun Chopra#Michael Anderson
globals.abstract:
Kurtzac ePage is a mobile application that assists you to create augmented HTML listings for eBay, Craiglist, WordPress, Blogger and HTML compliant applications. This augmented HTML listing contains a plethora of content like text, video, file and images.

The generated output can be pasted to other HTML inject worthy mobile and web applications. You donâ€™t have to type HTML in your smartphone. Interact with Kurt (the chimp) within the application and revitalize your mobile content for blogs and selling platforms.
